type: Superalgos Review - In bitcoin since 2011 and I managed to miss Superalgos

definition.text: Write a summary for this review page.

paragraphs.text: Thanks to Bing-ChatGPT I found this great open source project to automate some of my trades.
I'm also ecstatic with prospect of AI trading.
I will try to test and contribute as much as I can.

I have experience with computer systems since 1986 and I'm a "retired" Computer Scientist with most experience in Administering Server and Network equipment. I also use Linux since 1998. I run windows only if I have to and only in VMs under linux.
And finally I'm a native Greek speaker.
